summary.span: 表示傳送到資料服務的作業回應，做為呼叫 的結果。

span.span: Represents the response to operations sent to the data service as a result of calling .

summary.span: 與批次要求相關聯之 HTTP 回應中的標頭。

span.span: The headers from an HTTP response associated with a batch request.

value.span: 物件，其中包含 HTTP 回應的名稱值組。

span.span: An object containing the name-value pairs of an HTTP response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 未使用批次處理時，傳回的 執行個體上的標頭屬性將是空集合，因為沒有一組標頭表示整個儲存作業。The headers property on the instance returned will be an empty collection when batching is not used because there is no set of headers that represents the entire save operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public int BatchStatusCode { get; }
.property instance int32 BatchStatusCode
Public ReadOnly Property BatchStatusCode As Integer
public: property int BatchStatusCode { int get(); };

summary.span: 與批次要求相關聯之 HTTP 回應中的狀態碼。

span.span: The status code from an HTTP response associated with a batch request.

value.span: 中所定義的狀態碼為基礎的整數[超文字傳輸通訊協定](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=119520)。

span.span: An integer based on status codes defined in [Hypertext Transfer Protocol](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=119520).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於批次處理作業，這是與整個批次相關聯之 HTTP 回應中的狀態碼。For batching operations, this is the status code from the HTTP response associated with the entire batch. 對於非批次處理要求，值一定是 200，這表示呼叫端必須檢查每個作業以判斷它的結果。For non-batching requests, the value is always 200, which means the caller must inspect each operation to determine its result.
